p: “Examination of the distribution of the lamination markers TBR1 (layer 6), CTIP2 (layer 5 and a subset of cells in layer 6), SATB2 (layers 2-4, and a subset of cells in layer 5), and CUX1 (layers 2 and 3), revealed MIA-induced cortical layer-specific alterations in lamination, thickness, and cell density at E17.5 (Figure 5A-B, E-F).”
